message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, considering its value to you is $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $11,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. To further accommodate you, I am willing to consider $10,750 as the final price for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise, considering the value you place on it. Please let me know if this works for you.
